HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.Name: UpdateFeatureBase
HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.modNameReadable: From Ashes to Ashes, Dust to Dust

HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: - Update Watery Casket texture to actually fit bodies in without having to break bones - Pirates will now be drunk at the end of the funeral - no more sober Pirate Parties - If you have the Pirate Meme from Vanilla Faction Expanded Pirates, the Pirate Funeral precept will now be required
